name: Happy Solitaire
description:
Welcome to the magical world of SOLITAIRE！
Let’s join in a fun card game for free!
If you love solitaire and are looking for new challenge, you have come to the right place! Happy Solitaire is more funny than classic solitaire games, and can bring you a Lucky Time to earn BIG REWARDS!
Discover a new solitaire game with a lot of fun! Easy to play and winning by luck. That’s really a great way to relax your mind.
Lots of unique solitaire card game layouts. Complete your combo and boost your gameplay. Easy to play, yet challenging to master.
Happy Solitaire, the best free card game! Enjoy your Lucky time and win yourself BIG PRIZES!
